QuestData.Title: Re-Reclaim
QuestData.Description: Mogu are thugs. They have always been thugs.$b$bOnly when they ruled their empires in the old stories did they ever know any kind of magic.$b$bBut these mogu are using arcane portals and spells. We need to stop them!$b$b$p, look for any artifacts the mogu are using to cast their magics with. I saw a number of their collectors and reclaimers to the west and north that were gathering these items.
